name: RED SPACE
description:
slickramen top developer

It is the mid 1980s. Soviet Russia has assumed control of the cosmos. You play as a Soviet pilot tasked with gunning down enemy forces trying to invade your space.

Made in a day ish for the 7th ScoreJam / 1st PolySpace Jam. 

Mimics games such as Asteroids and other old space shooters from the 80s.

Programming, Art: By me.

Music: Flalcon

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys: Steer / Boost

Space: Shoot

WEB VERSION DOESN'T HAVE HIGHSCORES, DOWNLOAD TO COMPETE WITH OTHERS!

Try to become the best!
